description:
Usagi ends up agreeing to let Seiya spend the night at her place. Worried about leaving two young teenagers alone together, the rest of the girls decide to join them for a group sleepover.
Source: hulu

titles.title: A Night Alone Together: Usagi in Danger
Futarikiri no Yoru! Usagi no Pinch
Una noche para nosotros. Bunny en apuros.
ふたりきりの夜! うさぎのピンチ
